column4: Hello, been poking around with 8.04 and cannot get sound working with my emu10k1 card, previous releases have been problem free, but now can't seem to get this thing working at all. Is this a known issue?
Ok, I'll give that a go
Questions for unstable and testing versions of Ubuntu on channel #ubuntu+1 , please
thanks, (they should note that in the release notes, they just list #ubuntu)
